attributes.description: Table showing the list of Bugs submitted during the selected period. The results are limited to 2,000, in descending order by their creation date. The "filters" widget on the left can be used to narrow down the search. Another way to reduce the number of results is to select a smaller time frame. The filter bar looks for results in any field of the table.

attributes.description: This dashboard offers an enhanced version of the bug list from Bugzilla, showing the list of Bugs submitted during the selected period. The results are limited to 2,000, in descending order by their creation date. The "filters" widget on the left can be used to narrow down the search. Another way to reduce the number of results is to select a smaller time frame.

attributes.description: The Evolution of the Backlog graph shows how the backlog has changed in the selected time frame. The chart starts at zero. Negative numbers mean you are reducing the total backlog. The closing date is not available in the Bugzilla index, so this is an approximation using the last comment date for "Closed" bugs.
attributes.title: Bug Backlog: Evolution of Backlog over time
attributes.visState:
{"title":"Bug Backlog: Evolution of Backlog over time","type":"timelion","aggs":[],"params":{"expression":".opensearch(index=freebsd_bugzilla, timefield="grimoire_creation_date")
    .subtract(.es(index=freebsd_bugzilla, q="status:Closed", timefield="last_comment_date"))
    .cusum().label("Backlog Evolution (approx. with last comment date)").legend(timeFormat="MMMM Do YYYY",columns=1),


.static(0).lines(width=0.8).color(black).label("").yaxis(label="Backlog Growth in # of Bugs")","interval":"1w"}}

attributes.title: Bug backog: Helping text
attributes.visState:
{"title":"Bug backog: Helping text","type":"markdown","aggs":[],"params":{"fontSize":12,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"### Backlog Growth

This dashboard focuses on efficiency in closing bugs.

*The metrics you see here correspond to the selected time frame. See the time selector on the top right.*

Charts:
* The Evolution of the Backlog graph shows how the backlog has changed during selected time frame. Negative numbers mean you are reducing the total backlog.
* BMI (Backlog Management Index) measures efficiency in closing issues. If you are above the 100% threshold, the team is closing more tickets than the ones received, so the backlog is decreasing. If you are below 100%, the backlog is growing.

Drill-down:
* Select a date range in the charts by dragging and dropping to get a more detailed insight into what is happening.
* The filters show a preview of the different options. Start typing text to get autocompletion suggestions.

Note:
* The Bugzilla index does not contain the closing date of the Bugs, so the values are approximated using the date of the last comment in "Closed" bugs."}}

attributes.description: This dashboard focuses on efficiency in closing bugs in the selected time frame. The Evolution of the Backlog shows how the backlog has changed during the selected time frame, while the BMI (Backlog Management Index) measures efficiency in closing issues. The Bugzilla index does not contain the closing date of the Bugs, so the values are approximated using the date of the last comment in "Closed" bugs.
attributes.title: Characterization #2 - Backlog Growth
Bugs needing attention: Filters
attributes.visState: {"title":"Bugs needing attention: Filters","type":"input_control_vis","aggs":[],"params":{"controls":[{"id":"1728466667887","fieldName":"product","parent":"","label":"Product","type":"list","options":{"type":"terms","multiselect":true,"dynamicOptions":false,"size":10,"order":"desc"},"indexPatternRefName":"control_0_index_pattern"},{"id":"1728466681119","fieldName":"component","parent":"","label":"Component","type":"list","options":{"type":"terms","multiselect":true,"dynamicOptions":false,"size":50,"order":"desc"},"indexPatternRefName":"control_1_index_pattern"},{"id":"1728466834153","fieldName":"severity","parent":"","label":"Severity","type":"list","options":{"type":"terms","multiselect":true,"dynamicOptions":false,"size":10,"order":"desc"},"indexPatternRefName":"control_2_index_pattern"}],"updateFiltersOnChange":false,"useTimeFilter":false,"pinFilters":false}}

attributes.description: Breakdown of the number of open Bugs submitted during the selected period. A Bug is considered as "Attended" when it has a value of Time to first attention and the last comment of the bug was submitted less than 3 months ago. A Bug will appear as "Unattended" when it does not receive any comment from a user different from the author. A bug will appear as "Abandoned" when there were other comments, but the last comment was made more than 3 months ago.
attributes.title: Bugs needing attention - Metrics
attributes.visState: {"title":"Bugs needing attention - Metrics","type":"metric","aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","params":{"customLabel":"Open Bugs"},"schema":"metric"},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"filters","params":{"filters":[{"input":{"query":"*","language":"kuery"},"label":"Total"},{"input":{"query":"last_comment_date:[now-90d TO now] AND time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Attended and Recently Commented"},{"input":{"query":"-time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Unattended"},{"input":{"query":"last_comment_date:[* TO now-90d] AND time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Abandoned (Last comment older than 3 M.)"}]},"schema":"group"}],"params":{"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":false,"type":"metric","metric":{"percentageMode":false,"useRanges":false,"colorSchema":"Green to Red","metricColorMode":"None","colorsRange":[{"from":0,"to":10000}],"labels":{"show":true},"invertColors":false,"style":{"bgFill":"#000","bgColor":false,"labelColor":false,"subText":"","fontSize":25}}}}

attributes.description: These rows can be used as filters for the table below, filtering by how much time the tickets are "Unattended".
attributes.title: Bugs needing attention: Filter by Time Unattended (table)
attributes.visState: {"title":"Bugs needing attention: Filter by Time Unattended (table)","type":"enhanced-table","aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","params":{},"schema":"metric"},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"filters","params":{"filters":[{"input":{"query":"timeopen_days:[180 TO *] AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: More than 6 months"},{"input":{"query":" timeopen_days:[90 TO 180] AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: Between 3 and 6 months"},{"input":{"query":"timeopen_days:[30 TO 90]  AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: Between 1 and 3 months"},{"input":{"query":"timeopen_days:[7 TO 30]  AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: Less than a month"},{"input":{"query":"timeopen_days:[1 TO 7]  AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: Less than a week"},{"input":{"query":"timeopen_days:[0 TO 1]  AND -time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Time Unattended: Less than a day"}]},"schema":"bucket"}],"params":{"perPage":6,"showPartialRows":false,"showMetricsAtAllLevels":false,"sort":{"columnIndex":null,"direction":null},"showTotal":false,"totalFunc":"sum","computedColumns":[],"computedColsPerSplitCol":false,"sortSplitCols":false,"hideExportLinks":false,"csvExportWithTotal":false,"stripedRows":false,"addRowNumberColumn":false,"csvEncoding":"utf-8","showFilterBar":false,"filterCaseSensitive":false,"filterBarHideable":false,"filterAsYouType":false,"filterTermsSeparately":false,"filterHighlightResults":false,"filterBarWidth":"25%","rowsComputedCss":"col0 == \"Time Unattended: More than 6 months\" ? attributes.description: These rows can be used as filters for the table below, filtering by how much time passed since the last comment was posted.
attributes.title: Bugs needing attention: Filter by Time since Last Comment (table)

attributes.description: List of "Unattended" Bugs. A Bug will be classified as "Unattended" when it did not receive any comment by a user different from the author of the Bug. The "Days Unattended" cells are highlighted in different shades of red according to the value (the more days unattended, the stronger the color is).

attributes.description: List of Bugs by the time since the last comment was posted in each of them. A Bug is considered as abandoned when there is a time difference greater than 90 days (~3 months) between the time when last comment was posted and the present.  The "Days since Last Comment" cells are highlighted in different shades of red according to the value (the more days, the stronger the color is).

attributes.description: Dashboard focused on the Open Bugs needing more attention, submitted during the selected period. A Bug will appear as "Unattended" when it does not receive any comment from a user different from the author who created it. A bug will appear as "Abandoned" when there were other comments, but the last comment was made more than 3 months ago.

attributes.description: Breakdown of the number of open Bugs submitted during the selected period. A Bug is considered as "Attended" when it has a value of Time to first attention and the last comment of the bug was submitted less than 3 months ago. A Bug will appear as "Unattended" when it does not receive any comment from a user different from the author. A bug will appear as "Abandoned" when there were other comments, but the last comment was made more than 3 months ago.
attributes.title: Open Bugs - Metrics
attributes.visState: {"title":"Open Bugs - Metrics","type":"metric","aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","params":{"customLabel":"Open Bugs"},"schema":"metric"},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"filters","params":{"filters":[{"input":{"query":"*","language":"kuery"},"label":"Submitted"},{"input":{"query":"last_comment_date:[now-90d TO now] AND time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Attended and Recently Commented"},{"input":{"query":"-time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Unattended"},{"input":{"query":"last_comment_date:[* TO now-90d] AND time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Abandoned (Last comment older than 3 months)"}]},"schema":"group"}],"params":{"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":false,"type":"metric","metric":{"percentageMode":false,"useRanges":false,"colorSchema":"Green to Red","metricColorMode":"None","colorsRange":[{"from":0,"to":10000}],"labels":{"show":true},"invertColors":false,"style":{"bgFill":"#000","bgColor":false,"labelColor":false,"subText":"","fontSize":15}}}}

attributes.description: This chart shows when "Unattended" and "Abandoned" bugs were created. A Bug will appear as "Unattended" when it does not receive any comment from a user different from the author. A bug will appear as "Abandoned" when there were other comments, but the last comment was made more than 3 months ago.
attributes.title: Open Bugs: When were the Unattended and Abandoned bugs created?
attributes.visState: {"title":"Open Bugs: When were the Unattended and Abandoned bugs created?","type":"line","aggs":[{"id":"1","enabled":true,"type":"count","params":{"customLabel":"# of Bugs"},"schema":"metric"},{"id":"2","enabled":true,"type":"date_histogram","params":{"field":"grimoire_creation_date","timeRange":{"from":"now-1y","to":"now"},"useNormalizedOpenSearchInterval":true,"scaleMetricValues":false,"interval":"w","drop_partials":true,"min_doc_count":1,"extended_bounds":{},"customLabel":"Creation Time (per week)"},"schema":"segment"},{"id":"3","enabled":true,"type":"filters","params":{"filters":[{"input":{"query":"last_comment_date:[now-90d TO now] AND time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Attended"},{"input":{"query":"-time_to_first_attention:*","language":"lucene"},"label":"Unattended"},{"input":{"query":"time_to_first_attention:* AND -last_comment_date:[now-90d TO *]","language":"lucene"},"label":"Abandoned (>3 M)"}]},"schema":"group"}],"params":{"type":"line","grid":{"categoryLines":false},"categoryAxes":[{"id":"CategoryAxis-1","type":"category","position":"bottom","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear"},"labels":{"show":true,"filter":true,"truncate":100},"title":{}}],"valueAxes":[{"id":"ValueAxis-1","name":"LeftAxis-1","type":"value","position":"left","show":true,"style":{},"scale":{"type":"linear","mode":"normal"},"labels":{"show":true,"rotate":0,"filter":false,"truncate":100},"title":{"text":"# of Bugs"}}],"seriesParams":[{"show":true,"type":"histogram","mode":"stacked","data":{"label":"# of Bugs","id":"1"},"valueAxis":"ValueAxis-1","drawLinesBetweenPoints":true,"lineWidth":2,"interpolate":"cardinal","showCircles":true}],"addTooltip":true,"addLegend":true,"legendPosition":"right","times":[],"addTimeMarker":false,"labels":{"show":false},"thresholdLine":{"show":false,"value":10,"width":1,"style":"full","color":"#E7664C"}}}

attributes.description: Distribution of Open Bugs by their Time to First Attention, defined as the number of days since the creation of the Bug and the date of the first comment by a user different from the author of the Bug. If this does not happen, the Bug will be classified as "Unattended". Each bar is divided showing the number of bugs per Severity level.
attributes.title: Open Bugs: Hor. Bar chart by time to first attention

attributes.description: Distribution of Open Bugs by the Time since the last comment, defined as the number of days since the last comment was posted and the current date and time. If this time is greater then 90 days (~3 months), the Bug is classified as "Abandoned". Each bar is divided showing the number of bugs per Severity level.

attributes.description: This dashboard provides a breakdown of the open Bugs submitted during the selected period, focusing on "Unattended" and "Abandoned" Bugs. A Bug will appear as "Unattended" when it does not receive any comment from a user different from the author who created it. A bug will appear as "Abandoned" when there were other comments, but the last comment was made more than 3 months ago.

attributes.title: Characterization #3 - Open Bugs: Attention times
